gen:link.msg:message: `GovernmentContributionsIncomeTransfersSchoolBoardsOther` BEHOORT NIET gerapporteerd te worden, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `JointVentureTailoredEducation` gelijk is aan `Nee`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedGovernmentContributionsIncomeTransfersSchoolBoardsBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA24_JointVentureTailoredEducation')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedGovernmentContributionsIncomeTransfersSchoolBoardsBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA24_JointVentureTailoredEducation return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedGovernmentContributionsIncomeTransfersSchoolBoardsBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA24_GovernmentContributionsIncomeTransfersSchoolBoardsOther')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedGovernmentContributionsIncomeTransfersSchoolBoardsBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA24_GovernmentContributionsIncomeTransfersSchoolBoardsOther return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
